text: Damon Wayans Jr. (born November 18, 1982) is an American actor, comedian and writer. In the sitcom Happy Endings, he was nominated for a Critics' Choice Television Award for Best Supporting Actor in a Comedy Series. He played Brad Williams in the show. Wayans is the son of actor and comedian Damon Wayans Sr. As a child, Wayans was in the comedy movie Blankman in 1994. In 2009, he played Thomas Uncles in the movie Dance Flick. Wayans was born in Huntington, Vermont. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Comedians from Vermont Category:Actors from Vermont Category:1982 births Category:Living people
title: Damon Wayans Jr.
